title: fix: align gemini-search registry with actual model
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Updated the gemini-search registry to correctly reflect the underlying model and its more efficient pricing structure.
gist.impact: Users benefit from significantly lower cost estimates for search-based generation tasks.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee adjusting a glowing price tag on a futuristic digital library shelf. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'UPDATED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
